#### **Endpoint**

`GET https://khaleejtimes-uat-web.qtstage.io/contentapi/v1/getmenugroups`

---

#### **Description**

This endpoint retrieves the menu groups and their associated items.

**Response**

##### **Success (200)**

A JSON object containing detailed information about the menu groups.

#### **Endpoint** `GET https://khaleejtimes-uat-web.qtstage.io/contentapi/v1/getcollectionsections/{collection_slug}` --- #### **Description** This endpoint retrieves section data for a specific collection,including child collections, identified by the collections`collection_slug`. --- #### **Path Parameter** | Parameter | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | `collection_slug` | String | The unique identifier (slug) of the collection. #### **Endpoint**

`GET https://khaleejtimes-uat-web.qtstage.io/contentapi/v1/getcollectionstories/{collection_slug}`

---

#### **Description**

This endpoint retrieves a list of stories associated with a specific collection, identified by its `collection_slug`. The results can also be paginated using `page` and `records` parameters.

---

#### **Path Parameter**

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `collection_slug` | String | The unique identifier (slug) of the collection. Example: `uae` |

---

#### **Query Parameter**

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `page` | Integer | The page number for pagination. Default : 1 |
| `records` | Integer | The number of records per page. Default : 20 |

**Response**

##### **Success (200)**

A JSON object containing the stories data for a specific collection based on the provided slug.

Query params

##### query

- query term
    

##### author

- filter stories by author slug provided
    

##### type

- filter stories by story template like all, photo, video, text etc
    

##### published_before

- filter stories published before a timestamp (should be 13 digits epoch)
    

##### published_after

- filter stories published after a timestamp (should be 13 digits epoch)
    

##### tag

- filter stories by tag slug
    

##### sort

- true or false can be send to sort by `latest-published` , by default sort will be true
